comments.body: The problem is that the package specifies the license as GPL, not more explicitly GPL2 or GPL3; it also doesn't include a license file. We've had this problem with other packages in the past, e.g. https://github.com/conda-forge/r-heatmap.plus-feedstock

When a package only specifies "GPL", CRAN expands this to "GPL2 | GPL3".

https://cran.r-project.org/package=mratios

Thus I think we should add either the GPL2 or GPL3 license file.

Also, @ocefpaf [recommends](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/3984#issuecomment-330966741) writing `license: GPL-2.0 and GPL-3.0` in this situation, but I don't feel strongly about the `license` field.
OK, I've gone the "GPL2 and GPL3" route.

  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'  # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-2'  # [win]
